segments.text: I notice the overflowing sink and can’t help but feel uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water cascades down, pooling ominously on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like watching a slow-motion disaster unfold before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman remains focused on her plate as if the chaos doesn’t exist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if she steps in it and slips? It feels so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically flying toward the cookie jar on that precarious stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t understand why he would risk a fall for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, slightly jumping on her toes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just tell her brother to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks serene, in stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
